complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Infrastructure and Development Environment
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the infrastructure setup into specific components: monorepo configuration, frontend Next.js setup, backend Node.js/Express setup, PostgreSQL database initialization, Redis configuration, deployment pipeline setup, development tooling configuration, and environment-specific configurations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple technology integrations, deployment configurations, and the need to establish the foundation for the entire system. Requires expertise in DevOps, multiple frameworks, and cloud platforms.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Universal B2B Visitor Tracking System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into: lightweight script architecture, session management system, IP-to-company mapping integration, behavioral tracking implementation, technology detection, real-time WebSocket communication, GDPR compliance features, performance optimization, cross-platform compatibility testing, and analytics integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity requiring advanced JavaScript optimization, real-time processing, compliance considerations, and universal compatibility. The <8KB size constraint and 90%+ accuracy requirement add significant technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build AI Revenue Prediction Engine with Industry-Specific Models
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: core scoring algorithm development, firmographic data processing, behavioral analysis engine, intent signal detection, timing factor calculation, industry-specific model training, buyer profile classification, competitive intelligence integration, real-time prediction updates, confidence scoring, accuracy tracking, and revenue attribution logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Maximum complexity involving machine learning, real-time processing, multiple data sources, and industry-specific customization. The 92%+ accuracy requirement demands sophisticated ML engineering and extensive testing.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Autonomous Revenue Optimization and Personalization System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: real-time trigger system, industry-specific personalization strategies, account-based personalization, progressive profiling workflows, A/B testing framework, dynamic content delivery, automated experience customization, platform integration layer, and performance optimization tracking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to real-time personalization requirements, multiple integration points, and the need for sophisticated trigger logic. Requires expertise in personalization engines and conversion optimization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: real-time pipeline visualization, revenue forecasting components, account intelligence displays, competitive monitoring interface, campaign attribution reporting, executive KPI tracking, and mobile-responsive design implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity focused on data visualization and executive-level reporting. Requires strong frontend skills and understanding of executive decision-making needs, but less complex than core ML components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Sales Intelligence Interface and Lead Management System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: hot accounts dashboard, visitor intelligence interface, territory management system, automated lead routing, real-time notification system, lead qualification workflows, mobile application development, and sales velocity tracking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring sales process understanding, real-time notifications, mobile development, and integration with existing sales methodologies. Multiple user interfaces and workflow automation add complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement CRM Integration and Data Synchronization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into: OAuth 2.0 authentication system, bidirectional sync engine, real-time score updates, contact enrichment workflows, custom field mapping, duplicate detection system, webhook processing, error handling mechanisms, and audit logging implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple CRM platform integrations, data consistency requirements, security considerations, and real-time synchronization challenges. Each CRM has unique API characteristics.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: event-driven workflow system, enterprise prospect detection, competitive intelligence workflows, account-based marketing automation, revenue attribution tracking, marketing platform integrations, automated email sequences, sales alert system, performance tracking, and rule customization engine.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving workflow automation, multiple platform integrations, and event-driven architecture. Requires sophisticated rule engines and reliable automation execution.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Marketing Attribution and Content Intelligence System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: full-funnel attribution tracking, content performance analysis, campaign ROI measurement, audience segmentation engine, A/B testing framework, analytics platform integration, attribution modeling, and automated reporting system.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring advanced analytics, multi-touch attribution modeling, and integration with various marketing platforms. Complex data processing and attribution logic needed.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Enterprise Security and Compliance Framework
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: encryption implementation, SOC2 compliance setup, GDPR compliance features, RBAC system, SSO integration, data residency management, audit logging system, security monitoring, compliance reporting, and disaster recovery implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to multiple compliance requirements, security standards, and enterprise-grade features. Requires deep security expertise and understanding of various regulatory frameworks.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Real-time Performance Optimization and Monitoring
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Structure as: API performance monitoring, WebSocket optimization, database optimization, Redis clustering, CDN integration, auto-scaling configuration, performance analytics, caching strategies, and load balancing setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring expertise in performance optimization, scalability architecture, and real-time monitoring. Enterprise-scale requirements and sub-200ms response time targets add significant technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Comprehensive Testing Suite and Quality Assurance Framework
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: unit testing implementation, integration testing suite, performance testing framework, end-to-end testing, A/B testing infrastructure, automated testing pipeline, accuracy validation system, and user acceptance testing coordination.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity as it spans the entire system but follows established testing patterns. Requires comprehensive coverage of all components and integration with CI/CD pipeline.
